Class Smoother

java.lang.Object
Smoother
public class Smoother extends Object
The Smoother class is responsible for taking salted data and making it more understandable.

    void
    runSmoother(int windowValue, int numberOfRuns, int width, int height)
    The runSmoother method is responsible for running the smoothData method the number of times the user would like and plotting the results of the smoothing.
    void
    smoothData(int windowValue)
    The smoothData method takes in salted values and finds the average of a set number of values to smooth the data.

    • Smoother

      public Smoother(ArrayList<Double> yValues)
      Additional constructor for the Smoother class
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • smoothData

      public void smoothData(int windowValue)
      The smoothData method takes in salted values and finds the average of a set number of values to smooth the data.
      Parameters:
      windowValue - The number of data points to be averaged to smooth the data

    • runSmoother

      public void runSmoother(int windowValue, int numberOfRuns, int width, int height)
      The runSmoother method is responsible for running the smoothData method the number of times the user would like and plotting the results of the smoothing.
      Parameters:
      windowValue - The number of values to left and to the right of each value to average
      numberOfRuns - The number of times to run the smoothData method
      width - The width of the frame for the graph
      height - The height of the frame for the graph
